thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: U.S. Treasury Chief Sees No ‘Big Impact on the Economy’ From Trade Actions

author: Ryan Tracy
title: U.S. Treasury Chief Sees No ‘Big Impact on the Economy’ From Trade Actions
text:
WASHINGTON—A trade offensive by President Donald Trump won’t have a “big impact on the economy,” Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said Sunday, defending actions that spooked investors last week and contributed to U.S. stocks’ largest decline in two years.
“I think what we are doing is long-term very good for the economy,” Mr. Mnuchin said in an interview on Fox News. He was responding to a question about the significant decline in the stock market after the administration announced actions against China that sparked fears...
